= New & Noteworthy =

== 0.1.2 ==

  * IPTC caption automatically extracted from JPEGs that have it set
  * Uploads of one or more pages allowed
  * Extra file menu items (add photo, upload etc)
  * Many bug fixes
    * Key bindings not created until menu opened (CTRL-Z etc) 
    * NPE restore defaults in preferences
    * NPE loading JPEG with partial meta-data
    * "?:?" version when spaces in install path
